(Xinhua/Fang Zhe)  NEW YORK, Aug. 25 (Xinhua) -- As much of the world struggles to contain the coronavirus, China's recovery is gaining momentum, positioning it to further close its gap with the U.S. economy, according to an article, China's Economy, Bouncing Back, Gains on the U.S., published on The Wall Street Journal on Tuesday.
